label: 総領
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Family chieftain, one who has the ability to lead other dependent relatives of his family (ichizoku) in battle. A tozama warrior. As families increased in size and prosperity, the parameters of chieftain authority came to be contested, with some relatives attempting to assert autonomy. [一族、外様]
